name: Rroksas
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with maritime idioms
Daily small rituals woven into fishing work
Strong customs around tide-offerings and ship blessings
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents or specialized labor
long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
no high-pressure steam megatechs; limited combustion industry
notes: population unknown; seasonal influx of sailors
strategic minor harbor for coastal traffic
